com.microsoft.azure.management.sql

Interface ReplicationLinkOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReplicationLinkOperationsImpl

    public interface ReplicationLinkOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Replication Links. Contains operations to: Delete and Retrieve replication links.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReplicationLinkFailoverResponse beginFailover(String resourceGroupName, String serverName, String databaseName, String linkId)
      Begins failover of the Azure SQL Database Replication Link with the given id.
      ReplicationLinkFailoverResponse beginFailoverAllowDataLoss(String resourceGroupName, String serverName, String databaseName, String linkId)
      Begins a forced failover of the Azure SQL Database Replication Link with the given id which may result in data loss.

    • Method Detail

      • beginFailover

        ReplicationLinkFailoverResponse beginFailover(String resourceGroupName,
                                              String serverName,
                                              String databaseName,
                                              String linkId)
                                       throws IOException,
                                              ServiceException
        Begins failover of the Azure SQL Database Replication Link with the given id.
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the Resource Group to which the Azure SQL Server belongs.
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database that has the replication link to be failed over.
        linkId - Required. The id of the replication link to be failed over.
        Returns:
        Response for long running Azure Sql Database replication failover operations.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.

      • delete

        OperationResponse delete(String resourceGroupName,
                         String serverName,
                         String databaseName,
                         String linkId)
                  throws IOException,
                         ServiceException,
                         InterruptedException,
                         ExecutionException
        Deletes the Azure SQL Database Replication Link with the given id.
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the Resource Group to which the Azure SQL Server belongs.
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database that has the replication link to be dropped.
        linkId - Required. The id of the replication link to be deleted.
        Returns:
        A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        InterruptedException - Thrown when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, and the thread is interrupted, either before or during the activity. Occasionally a method may wish to test whether the current thread has been interrupted, and if so, to immediately throw this exception. The following code can be used to achieve this effect:
        ExecutionException - Thrown when attempting to retrieve the result of a task that aborted by throwing an exception. This exception can be inspected using the Throwable.getCause() method.

        databaseName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database that has the replication link to be dropped.
        linkId - Required. The id of the replication link to be deleted.
        Returns:
        A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.

      • failover

        ReplicationLinkFailoverResponse failover(String resourceGroupName,
                                         String serverName,
                                         String databaseName,
                                         String linkId)
                                  throws InterruptedException,
                                         ExecutionException,
                                         IOException
        Fails over the Azure SQL Database Replication Link with the given id.
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the Resource Group to which the Azure SQL Server belongs.
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database that has the replication link to be failed over.
        linkId - Required. The id of the replication link to be failed over.
        Returns:
        Response for long running Azure Sql Database replication failover operations.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - Thrown when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, and the thread is interrupted, either before or during the activity. Occasionally a method may wish to test whether the current thread has been interrupted, and if so, to immediately throw this exception. The following code can be used to achieve this effect:
        ExecutionException - Thrown when attempting to retrieve the result of a task that aborted by throwing an exception. This exception can be inspected using the Throwable.getCause() method.
        IOException - Thrown if there was an error setting up tracing for the request.

      • get

        ReplicationLinkGetResponse get(String resourceGroupName,
                               String serverName,
                               String databaseName,
                               String linkId)
                        throws IOException,
                               ServiceException
        Returns information about an Azure SQL Database Replication Link.
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the Resource Group to which the server belongs.
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Server on which the database is hosted.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database to get the link for.
        linkId - Required. The replication link id to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Represents the response to a Get Azure Sql Database Replication Link request.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
